page.title: 12HELSTON INDUSTRIAL ESTATE(2)
page.content: The largest factory on the estate is{ {Lee Cooper, }who make jeans to export all over the world. Other manufacturers include; Rees who bind books, and make fancy leather goods. Trailers are manufactured by the two man firm of Garfield Keverne, whose premises are next door to Scorse the butchers, who supply meat to all the local schools. L.E.D. specialise in commercial and industrial electronics. A.P. Valves make life-jackets which are sold all over the world. S.A.R. Diving are concerned with commercial diving in the North Sea. Farm Industries supply agricultural machinery and Brewers the printers have been on the estate for 12 years. South West Power Tools like some other firms mentioned moved to the estate as their businesses expanded.
